title: Can't finish registering for pbe account
body: i enter my new information for a pbe acc (i got accepted) and it doesnt make the acc

replies.body:
I went ahead and checked your account to see where you are in the PBE application process. It looks like you were able to apply and we did receive it. At this point, you'll need to wait for an acceptance email to see if you get accepted to the PBE servers. 

Applying for PBE doesn't automatically get you an account, but keep an eye out for your acceptance email! You find all the details on how you can get accepted on our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).
Ok, thank you, i thought i was already accepted, because it said, "Congratulations, you have been accepted", and it tells me to make a new username and password.

There isn't too much information to go off of here. Have you tested to make sure the account wasn't created and merely not prompted? If it wasn't, I would try clearing your browser cache and trying again.
